title: 【DFK#000】Framework of Making a proposal for DFK DAO 【Opinion Collection】
body:
Proposal Date: 2020/12/08
Proposal Type: Operation

Abstract
DFK#000 is a creation proposal of DFK governance. It aims to standarize the proposal process for DFK governance.

Main Content

Rules for how to propose a proposal
Anyone who wants to propose a proposal needs to follow the steps below:
First Step: Propose a proposal
   Currently, anyone can be an initiator of the DFK proposal (if the threshold is not too reasonable for the comunity, further revision can be made in the future), to provide solutions or improvements for existing problems in the project.

Second Step: Proposal Discussion
    The proposer needs to release his/her ideas to the community forum to get a full discussion. The purpose is to make the proposal more profundity and solidity. 
    There are some rules the proposer needs to order when they release idea to the forum

   (1) The proposer needs to briefly introduce the problems they are going to resolve, the purpose and the its significance, as well as its potential benefits and risks. (The content should be less than 100 words)

(2) The post should be named based on the format that [Proposal Discussion] + Discussed Topic +  [Deadline for the Discussion]

(3) The forum administrator will check the proposal first, and then, place those regular post at the top for better discussion and kick back those irregular post for further revision. 

(4) The proposal discussion is closed by the deadline. The proposer can enrich and perfect the proposal based on the discussion.

Third Step: Prepare Proposal
   The proposal should be organized based on the following format.

  (1) Preamble
Including
No of proposal (DFK#)
Title
Type
Date proposed
Dependencies: relationship with previous proposals, like upgrade or substitution (if any)
(2) Abstract
   Use briefly words to introduce the proposal, and its purpose and significance
(3) Main body of the proposal
   The main body of the proposal includes the following parts:
      
      The main content and related procedure
      The schedule of the proposal (if any)
      A brief analysis about the potential benefits of the proposal
      A brief analysis about the potential risks behind the proposal
      Analyze if other projects have adopted similar proposals
      Analyze the resource and assistance needed for the implementation of 
      the proposal
      Recommend related teams that are suitable for charging the proposal (if 
      any)

Fourth Step: Release the proposal on Snapshot
Snapshot address: https://snapshot.page/#/dfking.eth
     
    First, click "connect wallet" and login with DFK address

    Second, click "New proposal"

    Third, enter your proposal in this screen. In the "Action" section, set the starting and end time. In the "Choices" section, set the voting option, like "Agree" and "Disagree"

     Finally, click "Publish" after checking

Rules for how to vote
     DFK is a project dominated by the community, all token holders will play an important role in the development of the project. Hope everyone cherish your vote, and positively participant in the discussion and vote of the community development. 

Threshold for a proposal to be effective: no less than 1,000,000 DFK votes
Threshold for a proposal to get passed: more than 50% of votes support the proposal
author: 0xDA0584F50a51c589f24048515D1F6CDBcAc42896
